    • getPPInBattle

      public int getPPInBattle(String name) throws PoobkemonException
      Gets the PP (Power Points) of a specific movement in the current battle
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the movement
      Returns:
      The PP value of the specified movement
      Throws:
      PoobkemonException - If the movement doesn't exist or cannot be performed

    • addNewPokemon

      public void addNewPokemon(String entrenador, String pokemon, Movement m1, Movement m2, Movement m3, Movement m4) throws PoobkemonException
      Adds a new pokemon with specific movements to a trainer
      Parameters:
      entrenador - Name of the trainer
      pokemon - Name of the pokemon to add
      m1 - First movement
      m2 - Second movement
      m3 - Third movement
      m4 - Fourth movement
      Throws:
      PoobkemonException - If the trainer or pokemon don't exist
